thread.title: 'Pendulum' will swing back, says Supreme Court judge
thread.title_full: 'Pendulum' will swing back, says Supreme Court judge

title: 'Pendulum' will swing back, says Supreme Court judge
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device 'Pendulum' will swing back, says Supreme Court judge 23 February 2017 Last updated at 16:55 GMT Supreme Court Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg says the US is "not experiencing the best of times" - but the "pendulum" will swing back. 
Speaking in a rare interview with Olly Lambert for BBC Newsnight , Justice Ginsburg also reiterated the importance of the free press. 
Justice Ginsburg was attending the final dress rehearsal of Dead Man Walking at the Kennedy Center in Washington, DC - an opera looking at the moral ambiguity of the death penalty in America. 
Justice Ginsburg was nominated by Bill Clinton and is regarded as a liberal.
